title: SyncGranuleInput
description: Describes the input expected by the sync-granule task

producerGranuleId.description: Granule ID from the producer, if available

name.description: name of file to be synced

filename.description: optional field - usage depends on provider type

source_bucket.description: optional - alternate source bucket to use for this file instead of the provider bucket.  Works with s3 provider only, ignored for other providers

path.description: provider path of file to be synced
